title: The Midterms Are the Republicans' to Lose | 1/5/22
description:
Filling in for Glenn, Stu and Jeffy discuss the Omicron variant and how it’s affecting businesses and life across the country. Stu goes through the stats of Omicron across the world. Stu and Jeffy critique President Biden’s handling of the COVID pandemic and inflation. The midterms are the Republicans' to lose, as President Biden’s failures in Afghanistan, COVID, and the economy are on the front of Americans' minds. Stu reviews the outcomes of the previous midterm elections. Stu gives a preview of Glenn’s one-on-one interview with President Trump. Jason Buttrill joins to discuss the experience of meeting President Trump at Mar-a-Lago. Stu and Jeffy go through a list of things they wouldn't have guessed would occur in society.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
